Wakari Senju.name: Energy Infusion – Full Body
Wakari Senju.description: Channels raw energy into any part of his body for explosive combat power.

Wakari Senju.name: Purple Surge – Inner Focus
Wakari Senju.description: Enters a heightened energetic state where his aura amplifies all senses despite blindness.

Wakari Senju.name: Signature Form – Echo of the Senju
Wakari Senju.description: A transformation channeling ancestral martial spirits through his aura and strikes.

Wakari Senju.name: Echo Sense
Wakari Senju.description: Using vibration and energetic frequency, Wakari 'sees' the world without sight.

Wakari Senju.name: Rising Strike – Crescent Palm
Wakari Senju.description: A spiritual martial technique passed down from Cartier Karo’s lineage, infused with kinetic Chi.

Asa Knight.name: Healing Light Pulse
Asa Knight.description: Generates restorative light that can mend severe wounds or revive allies from near-death.

Asa Knight.name: Energetic Surge – Bloom of Resilience
Asa Knight.description: Asa’s aura flares with pink flower petals and healing waves, enhancing her allies' stamina and focus.

Asa Knight.name: Spirit Infusion – Lotus Heart
Asa Knight.description: A form where she bonds with an ancient spirit of light, boosting speed, light affinity, and resistance to corruption.

Asa Knight.name: Radiant Bloom Barrier
Asa Knight.description: Summons a radiant dome of light infused with pink petals that blocks incoming energy attacks and gradually heals all inside.

Asa Knight.name: Essence Petal Rain
Asa Knight.description: Channels emotional energy into falling ethereal petals that purify curses, remove ailments, and boost the energy flow of all allies they touch.

Miguel Senju.name: Dual Surge Manifestation
Miguel Senju.description: Blue and purple energy wielded in both hands, enhancing tactical offense.

Miguel Senju.name: Momentum Reversal
Miguel Senju.description: Shifts kinetic force of attacks mid-combat.

Miguel Senju.name: Energetic Surge
Miguel Senju.description: Early-stage form with unique aura balance.

Miguel Senju.name: Chi Thread Redirection
Miguel Senju.description: Manipulates residual energy trails to weave chi threads mid-air.

Miguel Senju.name: Split Nexus Pulse
Miguel Senju.description: Briefly separates the blue and purple energies into autonomous extensions of Miguel’s will.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Lightning Dash Assault
Kael Ranmaru.description: Kael vanishes in a blink and unleashes a flurry of high-speed charged strikes.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Energetic Surge – Flash Overdrive
Kael Ranmaru.description: In this form, Kael’s hair glows yellow and his body crackles with lightning, doubling his speed and reflexes.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Signature Move – Thunder Collapse
Kael Ranmaru.description: Channels lightning into the ground to erupt in a dome-shaped blast that paralyzes and scorches opponents.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Volt Mirage
Kael Ranmaru.description: Kael creates afterimages made of pure lightning that move independently for a few seconds. These illusions can detonate on contact or act as feints in battle.

Kael Ranmaru.name: Plasma Vein Surge
Kael Ranmaru.description: Temporarily converts Kael’s blood into hyper-conductive plasma, causing his strikes to ignore physical resistance and leaving streaks of residual lightning that chain between targets.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Shadow Slip
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Vanishes into surfaces and reappears unpredictably.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Tidal Slice
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Channeling water blades into martial strikes.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Surge Form – Abyssal Stalker
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Full Murkfolk energy unleash, eyes glow gold.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Blackwater Shroud
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: A dense mist infused with shadow and aquatic energy blankets the field.

Thalon the Shadowblade.name: Echo Fang Torrent
Thalon the Shadowblade.description: Thalon unleashes multiple delayed shadow-water slashes from different angles that converge after a delay.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Void Infusion
Sahil the Warlock.description: Forbidden Dark Energy channeled through a cursed gauntlet that consumes life force.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Shadowflame Spiral
Sahil the Warlock.description: Combines dark flame and shadow energy into an explosive barrage.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Surge Form – Abysscaller
Sahil the Warlock.description: Enhanced mode with flaring horn and dark mist rising from his corrupted arm.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Null Brand Detonation
Sahil the Warlock.description: Marks a target with a sigil of decay; detonates into a vortex of anti-energy that erases buffs and seals abilities.

Sahil the Warlock.name: Dread Crown Awakening
Sahil the Warlock.description: Calls upon the latent power within his cursed horn for an unstable, godlike energy boost.

Nyxis.name: Nuclear Shadow Daggers
Nyxis.description: Twin energy blades that phase through armor and disrupt life energy.

Nyxis.name: Assassin’s Echo
Nyxis.description: Mimics opponent’s last move within 1 second of witnessing it.

Nyxis.name: Silent Erasure
Nyxis.description: Becomes undetectable by sight, sound, or energy sensors for a short burst.

Nyxis.name: Radiocide Pulse
Nyxis.description: Unleashes a silent nuclear shockwave that fries tech and scorches the environment in a crescent arc.

Nyxis.name: Oblivion Step
Nyxis.description: A teleportation-like dash through shadow and radiation, degrading space for energy users that follow.

Joann Senju.name: Spirit Bloom Barrier
Joann Senju.description: Joann summons a radiant shield of ethereal light energy, enveloping allies in a protective dome that deflects incoming attacks and soothes wounds with gentle spiritual resonance, a hallmark of her role as the Senju matriarch.

Joann Senju.name: Healing Flow Technique
Joann Senju.description: Channels a serene stream of light energy through her hands, rapidly mending injuries and restoring vitality to allies. This technique, rooted in her mastery of emotional energy, fosters hope and resilience in battle.

Joann Senju.name: Ancestral Memory Pulse
Joann Senju.description: Emits a vibrant pulse of ethereal energy, invoking ancestral Senju spirits to inspire allies. The pulse enhances focus and morale, connecting fighters to the wisdom and strength of their lineage.

Joann Senju.name: Serenity Field
Joann Senju.description: Creates a calming field of light energy that radiates peace, reducing enemy hostility and bolstering ally defenses. Joann’s serene aura pacifies chaotic energies, making it a vital support technique.

Joann Senju.name: Ethereal Tide Call
Joann Senju.description: Summons a surging tide of ethereal energy that disrupts enemy formations. This spiritual wave, infused with light, cleanses negative effects and empowers allies with renewed vigor in combat.

Cartier Karo.name: Crimson Impact Drive
Cartier Karo.description: Unleashes a devastating strike infused with kinetic chi, channeling the Senju-Karo lineage’s martial prowess. The crimson energy surge delivers bone-shattering force, capable of breaking through even the toughest defenses.

Cartier Karo.name: Bonequake Step
Cartier Karo.description: Stomps the ground with immense force, triggering seismic tremors infused with chi energy. This technique, passed down through generations, destabilizes enemies and creates openings for Cartier’s legendary martial attacks.

Cartier Karo.name: Karo Fist Lineage Break
Cartier Karo.description: Delivers a powerful punch imbued with ancestral chi, shattering enemy barriers. The technique embodies the Karo family’s martial tradition, combining raw strength with spiritual energy to overwhelm foes.

Cartier Karo.name: Pressure Pulse Cannon
Cartier Karo.description: Fires a concentrated blast of kinetic energy, propelled by Cartier’s mastery of chi. The high-pressure pulse pierces defenses, delivering explosive impact to single targets or small groups.

Cartier Karo.name: Guardian's Warcry
Cartier Karo.description: Emits a commanding shout infused with chi, rallying allies and intimidating enemies. This ancestral technique boosts team morale and temporarily enhances physical strength, reflecting Cartier’s role as a protector.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Hollow Spiral Flame
Deaengelo Senju.description: Spins a vortex of dark flames, fueled by his obsession with destructive power. This chaotic energy engulfs enemies in a spiraling inferno, burning through defenses and leaving a trail of corrosive ash.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Dark Chi Reversal
Deaengelo Senju.description: Redirects enemy energy with dark chi, turning their attacks against them. Deaengelo’s mastery of forbidden energies allows him to manipulate and corrupt incoming forces, destabilizing opponents in combat.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Vengeful Surge
Deaengelo Senju.description: Unleashes a surge of dark energy, amplifying his destructive capabilities. This vengeful burst, driven by Deaengelo’s inner rage, enhances his attacks and overwhelms foes with raw, chaotic power.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Shadowbrand Clutch
Deaengelo Senju.description: Traps enemies in a shadowy grasp of dark energy, immobilizing them. Deaengelo’s technique brands foes with a corrosive sigil, draining their strength while bolstering his own destructive force.

Deaengelo Senju.name: Nexus Breach Infusion
Deaengelo Senju.description: Infuses attacks with chaotic dark energy, breaching the Nexus’s stability. Deaengelo’s forbidden technique destabilizes energy fields, amplifying his strikes with unpredictable, devastating power.

Aman Senju.name: Whisperwind Slash
Aman Senju.description: Delivers a swift, precise slash infused with wind and ethereal energy. Aman’s calm precision slices through defenses, channeling natural energy to disrupt enemy formations with graceful, flowing strikes.

Aman Senju.name: Nature Pulse Harmonization
Aman Senju.description: Emits a soothing pulse of natural energy, harmonizing allies with the environment. Aman’s technique restores stamina and enhances focus, drawing strength from the earth to support his team.

Aman Senju.name: Chi Feedback Loop
Aman Senju.description: Creates a cyclical flow of chi energy, amplifying ally abilities. Aman’s technique redirects ambient energy to boost team performance, reflecting his role as a composed support fighter.

Aman Senju.name: Ethereal Lull
Aman Senju.description: Projects an ethereal aura that calms enemies and reduces aggression. Aman’s light energy technique soothes chaotic battlefields, creating openings for strategic maneuvers and ally recovery.

Aman Senju.name: Senju Root Technique
Aman Senju.description: Channels natural energy through roots, anchoring allies and disrupting foes. Aman’s technique strengthens defenses and grounds energy flows, embodying the Senju legacy of balance and resilience.

Rina Nakamura.name: Liquid Construct Blade
Rina Nakamura.description: Forms a razor-sharp blade of water energy, slicing through defenses. Rina’s mastery of water constructs delivers precise, fluid strikes, cutting enemies with the relentless force of a rushing current.

Rina Nakamura.name: Aqua Barrier Bloom
Rina Nakamura.description: Summons a blooming shield of water energy, deflecting attacks. Rina’s defensive construct absorbs impacts and releases a soothing mist, protecting allies while maintaining her fluid combat style.

Rina Nakamura.name: Flow Pulse Cage
Rina Nakamura.description: Traps enemies in a pulsating cage of water energy, restricting movement. Rina’s technique creates a swirling vortex that confines foes, allowing allies to strike with tactical precision.

Rina Nakamura.name: Rippling Deflect
Rina Nakamura.description: Generates a rippling water energy barrier that redirects enemy attacks. Rina’s fluid defense reflects energy assaults, using the momentum of water to protect allies and disrupt opponents.

Rina Nakamura.name: Rising Wave Formation
Rina Nakamura.description: Unleashes a surging wave of water energy, overwhelming enemy lines. Rina’s technique floods the battlefield with powerful currents, pushing back foes and supporting allies with dynamic force.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Ethereal Projection
Kaito Tanaka.description: Projects an ethereal form of wind energy, confusing enemies. Kaito’s tactical technique creates a ghostly duplicate that distracts foes, allowing rapid repositioning and strategic strikes in combat.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Gale Burst Dash
Kaito Tanaka.description: Dashes forward with a burst of wind energy, enhancing speed. Kaito’s rapid movement creates a gale-force shockwave, knocking back enemies and setting up devastating follow-up attacks.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Wind Shield Layer
Kaito Tanaka.description: Forms a layered shield of wind energy, deflecting projectiles. Kaito’s defensive technique swirls air currents around allies, protecting them from attacks while maintaining his mobility.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Cyclone Deflect Pulse
Kaito Tanaka.description: Emits a pulsating cyclone of wind energy, redirecting assaults. Kaito’s technique creates a spinning vortex that deflects enemy attacks and disrupts their positioning on the battlefield.

Kaito Tanaka.name: Updraft Combo Flurry
Kaito Tanaka.description: Unleashes a flurry of wind-infused strikes, propelled by updrafts. Kaito’s rapid combo overwhelms enemies with relentless attacks, using his wind mastery to dominate aerial combat.

Haku Sharma.name: Ember Palm Strike
Haku Sharma.description: Delivers a fiery palm strike infused with kinetic fire energy. Haku’s tribal technique scorches enemies with explosive force, embodying his brawler spirit in devastating close-combat attacks.

Haku Sharma.name: Kinetic Flame Barrage
Haku Sharma.description: Unleashes a barrage of kinetic fire energy, overwhelming foes. Haku’s relentless assault rains fiery blows, combining raw power with tribal ferocity to incinerate enemy defenses.

Haku Sharma.name: Blazing Counter
Haku Sharma.description: Counters attacks with a sudden burst of fire energy. Haku’s technique turns enemy strikes into opportunities, enveloping assailants in flames while maintaining his aggressive combat stance.

Haku Sharma.name: Fire Spiral Kick
Haku Sharma.description: Spins into a fiery kick, propelled by kinetic fire energy. Haku’s tribal technique delivers a spiraling blaze, striking multiple enemies with explosive force and dynamic momentum.

Haku Sharma.name: Pressure Chain Break
Haku Sharma.description: Breaks enemy formations with a chain of fiery energy bursts. Haku’s technique unleashes relentless pressure, disrupting foes with kinetic flames and asserting his dominance in battle.

Dawn Blakes.name: Thunderclash Burst
Dawn Blakes.description: Unleashes a thunderous burst of lightning and fire energy. Dawn’s nexus-level power electrifies and incinerates foes, creating a devastating explosion that showcases her unmatched elemental prowess.

Dawn Blakes.name: Ember Lance Drive
Dawn Blakes.description: Thrusts a lance of fire energy, charged with lightning. Dawn’s technique pierces defenses with searing precision, combining fiery intensity and electric force to overwhelm her opponents.

Dawn Blakes.name: Surge Ignition Overload
Dawn Blakes.description: Triggers an overload of fire and lightning energy, devastating enemies. Dawn’s surge creates a chaotic blast, amplifying her nexus-level power to dominate the battlefield with elemental fury.

Dawn Blakes.name: Sparkblade Reversal
Dawn Blakes.description: Counters with a spark-infused blade of fire energy. Dawn’s technique redirects enemy attacks, slashing with electrified flames to turn the tide of battle in her favor.

Dawn Blakes.name: Phoenix Arc Discharge
Dawn Blakes.description: Releases an arc of phoenix-like fire and lightning energy. Dawn’s technique engulfs enemies in a radiant discharge, reviving her resolve while scorching foes with elemental power.

Selara Veyune.name: Waltz of the Soaring Bloom
Selara Veyune.description: Performs an aerial dance infused with wind and ultraviolet light. Selara’s Sylph-Human agility creates a blooming vortex, disorienting enemies while enhancing ally speed in combat.

Selara Veyune.name: Petalburst Shield
Selara Veyune.description: Summons a shield of wind and ultraviolet petals, deflecting attacks. Selara’s technique protects allies with a radiant barrier, burning through illusions with her unique energy signature.

Selara Veyune.name: Galeveil Embrace
Selara Veyune.description: Envelops allies in a stealthy veil of wind energy. Selara’s technique conceals movements, allowing her team to evade detection while striking with aerial precision and grace.

Selara Veyune.name: Ultraviolet Bloom Ray
Selara Veyune.description: Fires a piercing ray of ultraviolet light energy. Selara’s attack burns through defenses, blinding enemies and amplifying her aerial combat prowess with radiant, destructive force.

Selara Veyune.name: Skyward Dancer’s Pulse
Selara Veyune.description: Emits a pulsating burst of wind and ultraviolet energy. Selara’s technique enhances ally mobility and disrupts foes, creating dynamic openings for her graceful aerial assaults.

Xor’Zen.name: Voidstep Break
Xor’Zen.description: Executes a powerful void-infused step, shattering enemy defenses. Xor’Zen’s stoic combat style, rejecting energy reliance, delivers crushing force, destabilizing foes with pure physical might.

Xor’Zen.name: Silencing Hammer Fist
Xor’Zen.description: Delivers a massive fist strike that silences energy flows. Xor’Zen’s technique, honed by the Vigilant Watchers, crushes opponents with raw strength, disrupting their energy-based attacks.

Xor’Zen.name: Boneguard Counterhold
Xor’Zen.description: Forms a defensive stance, absorbing attacks with unyielding resilience. Xor’Zen’s technique fortifies his body, countering enemy strikes with the enduring might of a titan.

Xor’Zen.name: Iron Clasp Slam
Xor’Zen.description: Slams enemies with an iron-like grip, breaking their resolve. Xor’Zen’s brutal technique combines raw power and precision, overwhelming foes with his stoic combat prowess.

Xor’Zen.name: Titan’s Grasp Lockdown
Xor’Zen.description: Locks enemies in a crushing hold, preventing movement. Xor’Zen’s technique, rooted in pure physical strength, immobilizes foes, asserting his dominance as a Vigilant Watcher.

Faelix.name: Plaguewhisper Hex
Faelix.description: Casts a toxic hex that spreads plague-like dark energy. Faelix’s ritual corrodes enemy vitality, weakening defenses and sowing chaos, a hallmark of his Ashborn Circle mastery.

Faelix.name: Tongue Lash Venom
Faelix.description: Whips a venomous lash infused with dark energy, poisoning foes. Faelix’s toxic strike delivers lingering damage, disrupting enemy formations with the Ashborn’s sinister rituals.

Faelix.name: Miasma Spread Ritual
Faelix.description: Unleashes a miasma cloud of dark energy, infecting enemies. Faelix’s ritual spreads toxic corruption, reducing enemy effectiveness while bolstering his sinister control in battle.

Faelix.name: Corpse Echo Infliction
Faelix.description: Summons echoes of fallen foes, inflicting dark energy torment. Faelix’s ritual manipulates necrotic forces, weakening enemies with haunting visions drawn from the Ashborn’s arsenal.

Faelix.name: Rot Bloom
Faelix.description: Triggers a burst of dark energy, spreading corrosive rot. Faelix’s technique engulfs enemies in a toxic bloom, eroding defenses and amplifying his plague-wielding dominance.

Veyra.name: Siren’s Dissonance
Veyra.description: Emits a sonic wave of dark energy, disorienting enemies. Veyra’s Void Siren voice disrupts mental clarity, sowing confusion and weakening defenses with her Ashborn infiltration skills.

Veyra.name: Void Aria
Veyra.description: Sings a haunting aria infused with dark energy, paralyzing foes. Veyra’s sonic manipulation creates a void-like trance, immobilizing enemies and enhancing her stealthy strikes.

Veyra.name: Eclipsing Note Mirage
Veyra.description: Creates a mirage with dark sonic energy, concealing allies. Veyra’s technique distorts perception, allowing her team to evade detection while striking with deadly precision.

Veyra.name: Abyssal Choir Trap
Veyra.description: Traps enemies in a sonic cage of dark energy. Veyra’s technique envelops foes in a disorienting choir, restricting movement and amplifying her control over the battlefield.

Veyra.name: Voice of Madness
Veyra.description: Unleashes a maddening sonic wave of dark energy. Veyra’s voice induces chaos in enemy minds, disrupting their actions and cementing her role as an Ashborn infiltrator.

Morrow.name: Null Zone Collapse
Morrow.description: Collapses energy fields with a nullifying dark energy burst. Morrow’s technique suppresses all energy signatures, creating a dead zone that disrupts enemy abilities and enhances tactical control.

Morrow.name: Energy Disruption Veil
Morrow.description: Casts a veil of dark energy, neutralizing enemy energy flows. Morrow’s technique cloaks allies, disrupting opponent abilities and creating opportunities for stealthy Ashborn maneuvers.

Morrow.name: Deadspace Phase
Morrow.description: Phases into a null energy state, evading detection. Morrow’s technique creates a void-like phase, allowing him to slip through enemy lines and disrupt their energy-based attacks.

Morrow.name: Silence Break
Morrow.description: Unleashes a dark energy wave that silences all sounds. Morrow’s technique disrupts enemy communication, sowing chaos and enhancing his ability to control the battlefield.

Morrow.name: Void Echo Detachment
Morrow.description: Projects a dark energy echo, detaching from physical form. Morrow’s technique creates a void-like decoy, confusing enemies and allowing him to strike with Ashborn precision.

Elara.name: Infernal Twin Strike
Elara.description: Delivers twin strikes infused with dark and fire energy. Elara’s Ashborn strength unleashes a devastating assault, scorching and shattering enemies with her relentless physical power.

Elara.name: Crimson Vortex Leap
Elara.description: Leaps with a vortex of dark fire energy, crushing foes. Elara’s technique combines raw power and infernal heat, creating a whirlwind that devastates enemy formations.

Elara.name: Ember Crash Guard
Elara.description: Forms a fiery dark energy barrier, absorbing attacks. Elara’s guard channels her Ashborn might, protecting allies while burning enemies who dare approach her defenses.

Elara.name: Darkflame Combustion
Elara.description: Triggers a massive combustion of dark fire energy. Elara’s technique engulfs enemies in a blazing inferno, amplifying her destructive power as an Ashborn enforcer.

Elara.name: Field Breaker Howl
Elara.description: Emits a powerful howl infused with dark energy, shattering defenses. Elara’s technique disrupts enemy formations, using her physical prowess to dominate the battlefield.

Kaelor.name: Strategy Grid Deployment
Kaelor.description: Deploys a tactical grid of dark energy illusions, confusing enemies. Kaelor’s Ashborn strategy manipulates perceptions, creating false targets to outmaneuver foes in complex battle scenarios.

Kaelor.name: Mental Pulse Disruptor
Kaelor.description: Emits a dark energy pulse that disrupts enemy thoughts. Kaelor’s technique targets mental clarity, sowing confusion and weakening opponent strategies with Ashborn precision.

Kaelor.name: Reinforcement Barrier
Kaelor.description: Summons a dark energy barrier to bolster ally defenses. Kaelor’s tactical technique absorbs incoming attacks, protecting his team while setting up strategic counterattacks.

Kaelor.name: Thought Trap Relay
Kaelor.description: Creates a relay of dark energy, ensnaring enemy minds. Kaelor’s technique traps foes in illusions, disrupting their plans and enhancing his Ashborn tactical dominance.

Kaelor.name: Precision Null Zone
Kaelor.description: Establishes a null zone of dark energy, neutralizing abilities. Kaelor’s strategic technique suppresses enemy energy flows, creating a controlled battlefield for Ashborn maneuvers.

Tressia.name: Phantom Nerve Thread
Tressia.description: Weaves dark energy threads to disrupt enemy nervous systems. Tressia’s silent infiltration technique paralyzes foes, allowing her to slip through defenses with Ashborn stealth.

Tressia.name: Mistwalk Passage
Tressia.description: Phases through a dark energy mist, evading detection. Tressia’s technique cloaks her movements, enabling silent strikes and escapes as an elite Ashborn infiltrator.

Tressia.name: Silent Pulse Break
Tressia.description: Emits a silent pulse of dark energy, disrupting enemy senses. Tressia’s technique creates a stealthy shockwave, disorienting foes while maintaining her covert presence.

Tressia.name: Disrupt Veil Implosion
Tressia.description: Triggers a collapsing veil of dark energy, disorienting enemies. Tressia’s infiltration technique implodes defenses, creating chaos and openings for her silent Ashborn strikes.

Tressia.name: Fadepoint Mark
Tressia.description: Marks enemies with a dark energy sigil, tracking their movements. Tressia’s technique enhances her stealth, allowing precise strikes as an elite Ashborn operative.

Giren.name: Hunter’s Echo
Giren.description: Projects an energy echo, tracking Nexus signatures. Giren’s enhanced senses create a resonating signal, pinpointing enemies and guiding his strikes with relentless precision.

Giren.name: Vein Scent Burst
Giren.description: Releases a burst of energy, detecting biological signatures. Giren’s tracker ability amplifies his senses, revealing enemy positions and enhancing his effectiveness in pursuit.

Giren.name: Bone Dart Scream
Giren.description: Launches bone-like darts with a piercing energy scream. Giren’s enhanced attack delivers devastating strikes, combining biological precision with his hunter’s relentless focus.

Giren.name: Howl Mute Zone
Giren.description: Creates a silent zone with a disruptive energy howl. Giren’s technique nullifies sound, disorienting enemies and allowing him to track and strike undetected.

Giren.name: Pounce Latch Breaker
Giren.description: Leaps with energy-enhanced force, breaking enemy defenses. Giren’s tracker technique delivers a crushing assault, using his biological enhancements to dominate targets.

Brakka’Nul.name: Pulse Drain
Brakka’Nul.description: Drains enemy energy with a powerful pulse, consuming their power. Brakka’Nul’s Ravixx ability weakens foes, feeding his strength as the Pulse Eater in battle.

Brakka’Nul.name: Energy Maw Lunge
Brakka’Nul.description: Lunges with a gaping maw of energy, devouring opponent power. Brakka’Nul’s predatory technique absorbs energy, enhancing his Ravixx strength and overwhelming foes.

Brakka’Nul.name: Core Overload Burst
Brakka’Nul.description: Unleashes an overloaded burst of consumed energy, devastating enemies. Brakka’Nul’s technique channels absorbed power into a chaotic explosion, asserting his predatory dominance.

Brakka’Nul.name: Adaptive Echo Shift
Brakka’Nul.description: Shifts form with adaptive energy, countering enemy attacks. Brakka’Nul’s Ravixx ability evolves mid-battle, using consumed energy to outmaneuver and overpower his opponents.

Brakka’Nul.name: Predator Lockdown
Brakka’Nul.description: Locks enemies in a predatory energy field, immobilizing them. Brakka’Nul’s technique traps foes, draining their strength and solidifying his role as the Pulse Eater.

Daiko.name: Abyssal Blaze Surge
Daiko.description: Unleashes a surging blaze of dark fire energy, incinerating foes. Daiko’s manipulative technique engulfs enemies in an abyssal inferno, amplifying his control as Sahil’s mentor.

Daiko.name: Chainfire Entombment
Daiko.description: Traps enemies in chains of dark fire energy, restricting movement. Daiko’s technique entombs foes in a fiery prison, showcasing his mastery of destructive manipulation.

Daiko.name: Forbidden Flame Seal
Daiko.description: Seals enemies with a forbidden dark flame sigil, weakening them. Daiko’s technique inflicts lasting burns, manipulating energy flows to dominate his opponents.

Daiko.name: Wrath Pyre Cataclysm
Daiko.description: Triggers a cataclysmic pyre of dark fire energy, devastating all. Daiko’s technique unleashes his wrath, consuming enemies in a chaotic inferno of forbidden power.

Daiko.name: Dark Embers Rebirth
Daiko.description: Revives himself with dark embers, restoring vitality. Daiko’s technique manipulates forbidden flames to heal and empower, ensuring his dominance in battle.

Emiko Knight.name: Petal Soothing Aura
Emiko Knight.description: Radiates a soothing aura of light and wind energy, healing allies. Emiko’s graceful technique calms wounds and boosts morale, reflecting her strategic role as Asa’s mother.

Emiko Knight.name: Chi Restoration Bloom
Emiko Knight.description: Channels chi energy into a blooming light, restoring ally vitality. Emiko’s technique enhances recovery, using her mastery of emotional energy to strengthen team resolve.

Emiko Knight.name: Wind Whisper Guidance
Emiko Knight.description: Guides allies with a whispering wind energy, enhancing precision. Emiko’s technique directs movements, ensuring strategic strikes and evasive maneuvers in dynamic combat.

Emiko Knight.name: Harmonic Resolve
Emiko Knight.description: Emits a harmonic light energy wave, bolstering ally focus. Emiko’s technique synchronizes team efforts, amplifying their effectiveness with her graceful, strategic prowess.

Emiko Knight.name: Heartstream Field
Emiko Knight.description: Creates a protective field of light energy, shielding allies. Emiko’s technique infuses emotional energy, fortifying defenses and fostering unity in the heat of battle.

Kaelith Darien.name: Thunderbrand Surge
Kaelith Darien.description: Unleashes a surging wave of lightning energy, electrifying enemies. Kaelith’s elite technique channels raw power, delivering devastating shocks that disrupt and overwhelm foes.

Kaelith Darien.name: Stormheart Invocation
Kaelith Darien.description: Invokes a storm of lightning energy, amplifying her combat prowess. Kaelith’s technique summons electrified winds, enhancing her speed and striking force in battle.

Kaelith Darien.name: Static Guard
Kaelith Darien.description: Forms a static barrier of lightning energy, deflecting attacks. Kaelith’s defensive technique shocks assailants, protecting allies with her mastery of elemental power.

Kaelith Darien.name: Chain Lightning Arc
Kaelith Darien.description: Fires an arc of chained lightning, striking multiple enemies. Kaelith’s technique leaps between foes, delivering precise, electrified blows with devastating efficiency.

Kaelith Darien.name: Lightning Field Collapse
Kaelith Darien.description: Triggers a collapsing field of lightning energy, paralyzing enemies. Kaelith’s technique engulfs the battlefield in electric chaos, asserting her dominance as an elemental master.

Myssira of the Fifth Spine.name: Serpent Sigil Lance
Myssira of the Fifth Spine.description: Launches a water energy lance marked with serpentine sigils. Myssira’s Murkfolk technique pierces enemies, infusing them with paralyzing venom from the Abyssal Depths.

Myssira of the Fifth Spine.name: Fifth Spine Paralysis
Myssira of the Fifth Spine.description: Channels water energy to paralyze foes with a venomous strike. Myssira’s seer ability immobilizes enemies, reflecting her prophetic ties to the deep-sea Murkfolk.

Myssira of the Fifth Spine.name: Arcane Venomburst
Myssira of the Fifth Spine.description: Unleashes a burst of arcane water energy, poisoning enemies. Myssira’s technique spreads toxic currents, weakening foes and enhancing her control over the battlefield.

Myssira of the Fifth Spine.name: Scale Hex Surge
Myssira of the Fifth Spine.description: Surges with water energy, casting a scaly hex on foes. Myssira’s prophetic technique disrupts enemy abilities, binding them with the Abyssal Depths’ arcane power.

Myssira of the Fifth Spine.name: Poisoned Halo Veil
Myssira of the Fifth Spine.description: Cloaks allies in a venomous water energy veil, concealing them. Myssira’s technique protects her team while poisoning enemies who approach, leveraging her Murkfolk seer abilities.

Zaryk the Tailbreaker.name: Tailbreaker Smash
Zaryk the Tailbreaker.description: Delivers a colossal smash with Ravixx energy, shattering terrain. Zaryk’s brute force creates shockwaves, demolishing enemy defenses with the might of a planetary destroyer.

Zaryk the Tailbreaker.name: Groundsplitter Charge
Zaryk the Tailbreaker.description: Charges with earth-shaking energy, splitting the ground beneath foes. Zaryk’s Ravixx technique overwhelms enemies with unstoppable force, creating chaos across the battlefield.

Zaryk the Tailbreaker.name: Earthquake Roar
Zaryk the Tailbreaker.description: Emits a roaring burst of energy, triggering massive tremors. Zaryk’s technique destabilizes enemies, using his colossal strength to dominate with seismic devastation.

Zaryk the Tailbreaker.name: Iron Spine Slam
Zaryk the Tailbreaker.description: Slams enemies with an iron-like spine, infused with energy. Zaryk’s Ravixx technique crushes foes, leveraging his brute power to assert battlefield dominance.

Zaryk the Tailbreaker.name: Shatterquake Momentum
Zaryk the Tailbreaker.description: Builds momentum with energy-infused quakes, overwhelming enemies. Zaryk’s technique amplifies his Ravixx strength, creating relentless shockwaves that shatter opponent defenses.

Dronak.name: Reaper’s Guillotine
Dronak.description: Swings a dark energy guillotine, cleaving through enemies. Dronak’s Iron Reaper technique combines crushing strength and gravity fields, delivering lethal blows with Ashborn precision.

Dronak.name: Iron Wall Sweep
Dronak.description: Sweeps a wall of dark energy, blocking and crushing foes. Dronak’s technique fortifies defenses, using gravity fields to repel attacks and dominate the battlefield.

Dronak.name: Crushing Blade Lock
Dronak.description: Locks enemies with a dark energy blade, crushing their defenses. Dronak’s Ashborn technique immobilizes foes, leveraging his strength to control and eliminate targets.

Dronak.name: Execution Surge
Dronak.description: Surges with dark energy, amplifying his lethal strikes. Dronak’s technique enhances his Iron Reaper power, delivering devastating blows with crushing gravitational force.

Dronak.name: Ruststorm Slam
Dronak.description: Slams with a dark energy storm, corroding enemy armor. Dronak’s technique unleashes a rust-filled tempest, weakening foes and asserting his Ashborn dominance.

Lysar.name: Rift Slash
Lysar.description: Slashes through spacetime with dark energy, disrupting enemies. Lysar’s Riftwalker technique tears reality, delivering precise strikes that destabilize foes with Ashborn precision and void-infused power.

Lysar.name: Dimensional Fade
Lysar.description: Fades into a dark energy dimension, evading all attacks. Lysar’s technique allows stealthy repositioning, slipping through spacetime to strike enemies unawares with Riftwalker agility.

Lysar.name: Tearstep Ambush
Lysar.description: Ambushes from a spacetime tear with dark energy strikes. Lysar’s technique catches foes off-guard, using his Riftwalker agility to deliver devastating, unexpected blows.

Lysar.name: Void Tunnel Pierce
Lysar.description: Pierces enemies with a dark energy tunnel through spacetime. Lysar’s technique channels void power, striking with precision and disrupting enemy formations with Ashborn mastery.

Lysar.name: Spatial Break Seal
Lysar.description: Seals enemies in a dark energy spatial rift, immobilizing them. Lysar’s technique traps foes, leveraging his Riftwalker mastery to control the battlefield’s flow.

Serin Vale.name: Astral Rift Echo
Serin Vale.description: Projects an astral echo of light energy, confusing enemies. Serin’s Ethereal Watcher technique creates a rift, disorienting foes while guiding allies with mystic vision.

Serin Vale.name: Skyseer’s Reflection
Serin Vale.description: Reflects attacks with a light energy mirror, shielding allies. Serin’s technique uses temporal awareness to redirect enemy strikes, protecting her team with celestial power.

Serin Vale.name: Rune Bind Barrier
Serin Vale.description: Summons a runic barrier of light energy, blocking attacks. Serin’s technique fortifies defenses with mystic runes, enhancing ally resilience through her Ethereal leadership.

Kravonn Drex.name: Tideveil Strike
Kravonn Drex.description: Strikes with twin daggers infused with water energy, slicing foes. Kravonn’s Murkfolk precision delivers rapid, fluid attacks, overwhelming enemies with deep-sea tactical mastery.

Kravonn Drex.description: Ambushes from a water energy veil, striking undetected. Kravonn’s Deepkin technique cloaks his movements, allowing stealthy assaults with his signature twin daggers.

Kravonn Drex.description: Lunges with coral-shaped water energy daggers, piercing defenses. Kravonn’s technique combines Murkfolk agility and precision, delivering devastating strikes in rapid succession.
